meanings.sent1: The bird flew unshackled in the open sky.
meanings.sent2: The prisoner felt unshackled after serving his time.
meanings.sent3: The unshackled dog happily ran around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her unshackled creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unshackled kite soared high above the trees.

meanings.sent1: The unshackled imagination of children is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent2: After the exam, the students felt unshackled from stress.
meanings.sent3: The unshackled river flowed freely through the valley.
meanings.sent4: His unshackled spirit embraced every opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The unshackled dancer moved gracefully across the stage.
